mapper.select: select count(*) from gukbap_user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gukbap_user (user_id, user_password, user_first_name, user_last_name, user_birthdate, user_phone) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{user_password}, #{user_first_name}, #{user_last_name}, to_date(#{user_birthdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{user_phone})
